729001f-a.text:
Hylan Boulevard, at the N.W. corner of Old Town Road, showing the 'Villa Tocci'. The house is 100 feet back of the road.
April 22, 1932.
P. L. Sperr
729001f-a.original_title: Richmond: Hylan Boulevard - Old Town Road
729001f-a.folder: Hylan Boulevard & Old Town Road, Staten Island, NY

729260f-a.text:
Old Town Road, south side, between Hylan Boulevard and Oregon Road, showing the Garretson House, part of which dates to colonial days. In 1874 it belonged to W.W. McFarland; from 1898 to 1907 to Rumpf, and in 1917 to M.M. Rutman.
1924
P. L. Sperr
729260f-a.original_title: Richmond: Old Town Road - Hylan Boulevard
729260f-a.folder: Old Town Road & Hylan Boulevard, Staten Island, NY
